price: 58. Mboka moko te ya bobubi ekotikala sé toboma yango yambo ya mokolo mwa suka ekoka, to tokopesaka yango etumbu ya makasi. Nyoso wana esila kokomama o kati ya buku.
arabic: وَإِن مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا نَحۡنُ مُهۡلِكُوهَا قَبۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ أَوۡ مُعَذِّبُوهَا عَذَابٗا شَدِيدٗاۚ كَانَ ذَٰلِكَ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مَسۡطُورٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-in min qaryatin illā naḥnu muh'likūhā qabla yawmi al-qiyāmati aw muʿadhibūhā ʿadhāban shadīdan kāna dhālika fī al-kitābi masṭūran
